gobblin.metastore

Interface StateStore<T extends gobblin.configuration.State>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - state object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FsStateStore

    public interface StateStore<T extends gobblin.configuration.State>
    An interface for stores that persist States.

    Each such store consists of zero or more tables, and each table stores zero or more States keyed on the state IDs (see {@link State#getId()).

        boolean create(java.lang.String storeName)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new store.

        A store that does not exist will be created when any put method is called against it.

        storeName - store name
        Returns:
        if the store is successfully created
